name: MyWebJourney
description: I made my first website when I was in high school. It was rough, but it was mine — and it's what got me hooked on building things for the web.

name: notAcursor
description: A library for giving your cursor a cool custom look on web pages. Simple to drop in, and makes any site feel a bit more unique and alive.

name: AniCss
description: A lightweight CSS library for button and text animations and effects. Plug it in and your elements come alive — no JS needed, just classes.

name: Button Will React
description: A collection of playful button pranks for the web. Buttons that dodge your cursor, buttons that fight back — small silly interactions that make people laugh.

name: AnimeWaifu
description: My first anime related apps and ecosystem. A collection of tools and scripts built around anime — this is where my obsession with mixing anime and code first started.

name: syswaifu
description: A Cross-Platform Neofetch-style system info with waifu images in terminal. Built for Linux, macOS, and Windows — shows your system stats alongside a waifu. Because why not make your terminal a little more fun.
